# coexr: Analysis Of Coexplosive Processes

Testing for rational bubbles in a bivariate coexplosive vector autoregression methodology as in [Engsted and Nielsen (2012)](https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1368-423X.2012.00369.x)


## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kvasilopoulos/coexr")
```
